item.title: US President Donald Trump has described ongoing "major combat operations" and called for Iranian government forces to lay down their arms. #DonaldTrump #Iran #US #News #BBCNews

item.title: Crowds were seen fleeing as a falling object sparked a fireball in Doha after Iran launched retaliatory strikes across the region in response to US and Israeli attacks. #Doha #Iran #US #BBCNews

item.title: A drone has been filmed striking a tower block in Bahrain's capital, Manama. Apparent Iranian attacks have been reported across the Middle East, after the US and Israel launched attacks across the country. #Iran #Bahrain #News #BBCNews

item.title: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was killed in his office on Saturday morning during a US-Israel attack, leading to retaliatory strikes across the Middle East. #Iran #Israel #US #Tehran #Khamenei #BBCNews

item.title: Mourners have taken to the streets of Iran's capital after the news that Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was killed in US-Israel strikes, while others have been seen celebrating. #Iran #Tehran #Khamenei #US #Israel #MiddleEast #BBCNews

item.title: People in cities across the world have been seen celebrating the killing of Iran's Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, by US-Israeli strikes. But many Iranians have been mourning his death. #Iran #Khamenei #US #Israel #MiddleEast #BBCNews
item.description: People in cities across the world have been seen celebrating the killing of Iran's Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, by US-Israeli strikes. But many Iranians have been mourning his death. #Iran #Khamenei #US #Israel #MiddleEast #BBCNews

item.title: Lucinda Ritchie has Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, a condition that affects the joints; functional neurological disorder, which impacts her mobility; Addison's disease, a hormonal disorder; and epilepsy. She was studying for a Master's in sustainability at South

item.title: American and Israeli forces have carried out strikes on cities across Iran, in what US President Donald Trump described as "major combat operations". Iran has responded by firing ballistic missiles and drones at US assets and allies across the region. #US

item.title: At least nine people have been killed and 27 injured in a missile strike on the Israeli city of Beit Shemesh, emergency services said. Iran launched strikes across the Middle East in response to a massive and ongoing attack against it by the US and Israel

item.title: A video of USA women's ice hockey captain Hilary Knight appearing to reject an invitation to the White House has been exposed as a deepfake. While the men's hockey team did attend, the women's team declined the invitation, citing scheduling issues. #US #W
item.description: A video of USA women's ice hockey captain Hilary Knight appearing to reject an invitation to the White House has been exposed as a deepfake. While the men's hockey team did attend, the women's team declined the invitation, citing scheduling issues. #US #W
